'''''Why Is It Always a Statue Mechanism?''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to pick up [[That Which Was Once Ehecatl]] during the quest ''[[The Frozen, Rekindling Land]]'' and place it on a pedestal at the far end of the ancient ruins in [[Fallingstar Fields]]. The ruins are first encountered during the quest ''[[Investigator of Ancient Ruins]]''.
